channel.title: Lost-Lands CLient--Open Source
channel.description:
[size=30pt]Lost-Lands Client[/size]
[font=Verdana]Works on any kind of server i made noob freindly for now....[/font] I GAVE CREDITS TO BASE THANK U PLZ DO NOT LEACH THERES ALOT OF TIME IN THIS
Open sorce
- All skillcapes, excect hunter - New Hairstyles and clothes. - Nonrenamed with 377 cache - Fixed Prayer bug (freezed client, not enough) - Vengeance works - hp bar - Reshape minimap - Edited sprites - Client tells, when update available - Custom crowns - Scrollbar fixed - 3rd armours - All God's swords - Added some new animations and npc's - Added some items - Fixed some Glitches/Bugs - Everything runs perfectly smooth (no invisible people) - Lunar Spellbook Works - Added Vengeance Emote
[img]http://i254.photobucket.com/albums/hh85/deadwalking22/chickachikachika.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i254.photobucket.com/albums/hh85/deadwalking22/fdghhh.jpg[/img]
DOWNLOAD HERE
http://uppit.com/7V3RTG http://uppit.com/7V3RTG http://uppit.com/7V3RTG http://uppit.com/7V3RTG
IF U NEED HELP MSN ME AT colbymyoung@hotmail.com
cred.
DELTA-25% Bluurr's-15% Fallen455-60%
I DID NOT LEACH I HAVE BEEN PLAYING WIT THIS CLIENT FOR A YEAR NOW NOW EVERYONE WANTS IT!!!!!!!!
